players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our fingers."
Diana: "I'm shocked about Bob too. We need to work together to figure out who could have done this. Does anyone have any information that might help us identify the mafioso?"
Diana: "Alice, you've been awfully quiet. In a situation like this, silence can be suspicious. What are your thoughts on what happened to Bob?"
You: "Based on my investigation, I believe Diana is the mafioso. I have evidence to support this claim and will share it with you all once the game is over."
